Play a song in your voice channel.

## Usage

```sh
/play
```

## Options

|   Name  |                        Description                        | Required |
| :-----: | :-------------------------------------------------------: | :------: |
| `query` | The title, URL, or keywords of the song you want to play. |    Yes   |
